description: <p>This is an exciting opportunity to join Liverpool Heart and Chest Hospital, the largest single site specialist heart and chest hospital in the country, and the only one rated ‘Outstanding’ by the Care Quality Commission. Here at LHCH, we have a clear vision to be the best cardiothoracic integrated healthcare organisation. Applications are invited for the post of Consultant Cardiologist with a special interest in Coronary Intervention. This post is within the Cardiology Department, part of the Division of Medicine. The post is a 10 + 2 PA position, working as a Consultant Interventional Cardiologist, participating in the on-call PPCI and consultant of the week Rota.. An interest in complex PCI would be desirable. The successful applicant will join a team of eight in-house and six joint appointee interventional colleagues. The post will contribute to the continued delivery of current levels of specialist Interventional Cardiology service for the Cheshire and Merseyside region. The department has 5 dedicated cardiac catheter laboratories (3 X PCI, 2 X EP) offering a 24/7 primary PCI service and performs over 2,300 PCI procedures per annum. Other services provided include TAVI, structural and ACHD intervention.</p>
